text: Richard Dean Mulder (May 8, 1938 â€“ February 14, 2022) was an American Republican politician and physician. He was in the Minnesota House of Representatives from 1995 until 2002. In 2004, he was a Minnesota state delegate at the 2004 Republican National Convention. Mulder was born in Rock Valley, Iowa. Mulder died on February 14, 2022 in Ivanhoe, Minnesota at the age of 83.Dr. Richard D.
